name: Watermelon Wonderland
description:
Contribution to Junction 2020: Children Pain Distraction challenge for Helsinki University Hospital.

We made this game in 40 hours.

This is healthcare mobile VR game with a custom squish controller! Our target audience is kids, who are having a hard time visiting their dentist.
Control a cute watermelon character, pick up seed coins and defeat boring vegetable guys!

This is a WebGL version, where you can do all the same things without a mobile VR set and using only you Space button!

Controls:

press Space to fly
